name: SQUARE (jok-square)
description:
Insta-death 2d physical platformer with a grappling hook.  This is an early prototype/proof of concept.

Controller Required!

CONTROLS

Left Stick - movement/dash direction

B + Left Stick - dash

Right Stick - grapple/gun aim

Right Trigger Hold + Right Stick - shoot grapple

Right Trigger Release - release grapple

A - jump (you get 2 jumps after hitting a wall or other jumpable object)  (you get one jump back after a grapple release)

Left Stick + Right Bumper - throw swapcube(if you picked it up)

X - swap spaces with swap cube
